title: CLI Stable Release v1.5.23
description: Direct stable release from main branch. Version 1.5.23 built and published directly from the latest main branch.

community_feedback.quote: I experience the exact same issue. This is really annoying. When this issue happens it slow down a lot of others commands, like creating new file, deleting files, etc. Even saving a file takes 2 to 3 seconds...
It happens also with pre-release version of the extension.
